Text: thanks for the up do you have her original workout torrent?
oh please if you have the original 20 minute workout from 1983 i'm going crazy everyday looking for it
This is the only one I have (from my mother aww).

Thx for this download....it brings back so many memories off my teen hood wen I used to be fit....I have been looking for this for hours and now I have it again Thx mad my night lol....do u think u could find me Cher fitness body confidence pretty pretty plz.....or tell me where I could get the whole vid?

Thanks for the comments.

Unfortunately, I don't have any other ones. This 1985 workout happens to be the one that my mother always uses and I know it's really difficult to find in retail; I, therefore, decided I'd make a digital backup (just incase) and also upload it for others, since she had the copy laying around.

Note: Video is a bit grainy due to the VHS player that was used to do the transfer. The grain also results in a larger file size.
I wish to get obtain another VHS player so I can upload a cleaner version encoded via X.264 ASAP.
